Comment: There is zero chance Elon is "leaving." Publicly they'll say this to address the legality of having a permanent special employee, and to dispel any negative press. Why would he give up a chair at one of the most powerful tables at the world and disassociate himself from the government if he has the ability to cut off investigations into himself, grant himself juicy contracts, crush dissent, monitor the opinions of federal employees against him, and inject his own personal opinions into the decisions that shape the government.
